sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM067', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.LOC , M.EQPMN_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND M.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND M.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , M.MECH_FCLTS_SE , GAM_GET_MECH_FCLTS_SE_NM(M.MECH_FCLTS_SE) MECH_FCLTS_SE_NM , M.LOC , M.EQPMN_NM , M.EQPMN_NO , M.OPER_CMPNY , M.MFC_CMPNY , M.MFC_AMT , M.INSTL_YRMT , M.MFC_CHK_USR , M.OUT_REACH , M.BACK_REACH , M.REFLOAT_HT , M.PROCESS_ABLTY , M.DRIVE_WD , M.RAIL_WD , M.SELF_LOAD , M.WHEEL_WGHT , M.EQPMN_STNDRD , M.LINK_BRIDGE , M.RUBBER_FENDER , M.ELCTY_MTHD , M.CAPA_TON , M.CONTR_USR , M.CONTR_AMT , M.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , M.CLNG_SRC , M.HTNG_SRC , M.WATER_TANK , M.OIL_SAVE_TANK , M.SPICTANK_FMT , M.RM , M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD) MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F , MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
